summary: An ordinance authorizing and directing the Board of Public Works to proceed with the construction of certain additions and betterments to, and extensions of, the municipal street railway on University Way, and other streets and places, authorized by Ordinance No. 48404, appropriating money therefor, and providing for a temporary loan from the Municipal Railway Bond, 1919, Construction Fund to the Railway Extension Warrant, 1925, Betterment Fund.
